SUMMARY: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

Class Ext.ux.netbox.PreferenceManagerView

Extends Ext.menu.Menu.
Defined in PreferenceManagerView.js

This class is a view to show the preferences managed by a preference manager. The ui is similar to the bookmark one used by browser

Example 

//toolbar is a standard Ext.Toolbar
var prefManagView = new Ext.ux.netbox.PreferenceManagerView({preferenceManager: prefManager});
toolbar.add({text: 'Preference', menu: prefManagView});

Constructor Detail

Ext.ux.netbox.PreferenceManagerView

Ext.ux.netbox.PreferenceManagerView(config)
    Creates a new PreferenceManagerView. It takes as input a config object, usefull to config this component. The only mandatory attribute added is PreferenceManager.
    Parameters:
      Object config
      Ext.ux.netbox.PreferenceManager config.preferenceManager - The mandatory preference manager
      boolean config.defaultErrorHandling - True to delagate error management to the view, that simply shows the response text in a dialog. false to manage the errors on its own. Optional, default: true.
